greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Number of fault-free tilings of a 3 X n rectangle with squares and dominos.
comment: A fault-free tiling has no horizontal or vertical faults (that is to say, the tiling does not split along any interior horizontal or vertical line).
link: Colin Barker, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1000
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (1,4,-1,-1).
example: a(4) = 2 because these are the only fault-free tilings of the 3 X 4 rectangle with squares and dominos:
results.author: _Greg Dresden_ and _Oluwatobi Jemima Alabi_, Jul 06 2020
